gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hawks 109, Magic 92
gameRecap.excerpt: The Hawks defeated the Magic, 109-92. Dejounte Murray led Atlanta with 25 points, nine rebounds, and 11 assists as Jalen Johnson added 21 points, 10 rebounds, and seven assists. Franz Wagner (19 points, eight rebounds, five assists) and Wendell Carter Jr. (18 points, 10 rebounds) led the Magic in defeat. The Hawks snap a three-game win streak for the Magic and move to 25-32 as the Magic fall to 32-26.
